meanings.definition: Represent or embody (a concept or abstract entity) in a concrete form.
meanings.sent1: She instantiates her creativity by painting colorful pictures.
meanings.sent2: The sculptor instantiates his vision by shaping clay into beautiful statues.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a talking animal instantiates in the animated movie.
meanings.sent4: His dedication instantiates in every stroke of the brush, bringing life to the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The power of love instantiates in the heartfelt melody of the song.

meanings.definition: Create an instance or example of (something).
meanings.sent1: The chef instantiates a new recipe by combining unique ingredients.
meanings.sent2: The scientist instantiates a hypothesis through careful experimentation.
meanings.sent3: The magician instantiates a rabbit out of an empty hat, surprising the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her smile instantiates a sense of warmth that spreads to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The architect instantiates his innovative design in the construction of the futuristic building.
